    • addProject

      public void addProject​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String[] tags) throws java.io.IOException, java.text.ParseException
      Receives the information required to create a project, parses and reads the json file containing the project template and declares the structure needed to create a project
      Specified by:
      addProject in interface ma02_resources.project.Edition
      Parameters:
      name - chosen name for the project
      description - description to be given to the project
      tags - tags to be associated with the project
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there's an issue reading the file
      java.text.ParseException - if there's an issue parsing the file
